name: Future of Programming Lab
title: Language Developer
description: Using ReasonML/Ocaml to extend the language with novel new features, such as examples for inexhaustive pattern matching when inconsistencies are present.

name: EECS281 (DS&A) @ UofM
title: Instructional Aide (TA)
description: Leading lab sections, holding office hours, and actively seeking to improve existing course material (e.g. I redid our lab slides on DP with 100+ new slides.)

name: Innovation for Impact
title: Project Lead, Developer
description: Here I collaborate with other developers to create interesting real world projects, such as a Fintech app, and an app for keeping track of your friend group's incredible Lore.

name: University of Michigan Dining
title: Researcher
description: I worked with MDining to identify areas where we could reduce palm oil consumption. To do this, I developed a Python script to estimate palm oil from thousands of product's ingredient list.
